about.label: Who We Are
about.title: Dr. Gamal Aboudeif Law Firm
about.subtitle: For Legal Consultancy & International Arbitration
about.desc_p1: A leading international legal institution headed by Dr. Gamal Aboudeif, Cassation Attorney and International Arbitrator, and President of the Aboudeif Center for Arbitration. We are proud members of the International Bar Association (London) and the Arab Lawyers Union.
about.desc_p2: We possess a proven track record in managing major disputes, successfully settling international arbitration cases worth nearly $2 billion. Our expertise extends to preparing arbitration notifications before international organizations (OIC) for massive investment disputes.

why_us.title: Why Choose Us?
why_us.subtitle: Excellence Through Decades
why_us.card1_desc: Legal expertise spanning over 4 decades, starting with top honors in class of 1980.
why_us.card2_desc: A proven track record, including settling international arbitration cases worth over $2 billion.
why_us.card3_desc: Strategic partnerships with major law firms in London & Luxembourg, and international memberships.
why_us.card4_desc: Leadership combining practical experience with academic precision (PhD in Philosophy of Law - London).

services.cassation_desc: High-level representation before the Court of Cassation, Constitutional Court, and High Administrative Court.
services.criminal_desc: Strong defense and precise strategies in various criminal cases and financial crimes.
services.civil_desc: Comprehensive legal representation in civil disputes, compensation, and contracts.
services.family_desc: Handling personal status cases with complete privacy and understanding.
